contexts.context: ...If he could catch one, the two men could be <mark>saved</mark>. With his broken legs, he was a pathetic predator...
...nearly full crates. They were not only going to be <mark>saved</mark>, they were going to be rich, just as Harithoel...
...a good troupe, and it seemed smarter to try to <mark>save</mark> everyone. In any case, I lured the guards around...
...Wild Hunts could not be handled by any mortal or immortal <mark>save</mark> the ones sanctified to the Hunt and bound by its strictures...
